/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades painted in a palette of beige and brown, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, construction cranes can be seen, hinting at the city's continuous growth and development.
